reason: Code, migrations, routing queues, and ops/reporting tooling were completed and validated locally. Remote staging/prod deployment intentionally deferred for controlled release window.
requiredRemoteSteps: Create queues if missing: clawea-www-route-enterprise, clawea-www-route-smb, clawea-www-route-partner (+ staging variants)
Optionally set CRM_PROVIDER_CONFIG_JSON / CRM_PROVIDER_AUTH_JSON for external CRM handoff
Deploy: wrangler deploy --env staging, then wrangler deploy
